experiences.specialNote: 14-week intensive online class training on the fundamentals of computer technology, and project management essentials

duties: Led development for the API3 Ecosystem website, building engaging and responsive interfaces with Vue.js 3 and Nuxt.js
Developed complex data visualizations for Oracle Extractable Value (OEV) data, enabling users to explore blockchain information with advanced zoom and scaling options
Optimized website performance with state-of-the-art SSR/CSR strategies and enhanced state management, improving load times and responsiveness
Built multiple Web3 projects using React.js, including features like RainbowKit wallet integrations and secure blockchain interactions
Designed and developed Pizza Nano's website, creating a simple yet elegant online presence for a local family-owned pizzeria
Built the Bengaluru DeSci World event website, incorporating dual-theme functionality to blend global tech aesthetics with local Indian cultural elements
Completed a rigorous web design bootcamp, gaining hands-on experience in responsive, mobile-first design systems and modern web development techniques
Received mentorship while working on professional projects, honing skills in risk-taking, resilience, and adaptability to bring design concepts into real-world application
